text: Lɨci 9.19 Mt 14.1-2, Mk 6.14-15, Lu 9.7-9 abavɨmi. Limu hɨhɨle agɨlaŋ nasaŋ nameŋ abavɨlalɨ uavɨmi. Nɨbu hulaŋ iamɨgali avɨli hɨvɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiahaiaha hɨsɨŋ hulaŋ Jon aba abavɨlalɨ uavɨmi. Hɨhɨle agɨlaŋ nameŋ abavɨlalɨ uavɨmi. Nɨbu Elaija aba abavɨlalɨ uavɨmi. Hɨhɨle agɨlaŋ nameŋ abavɨlalɨ uavɨmi. Nɨbu Asɨ dɨ ciaŋ igalahalaha hɨsɨŋ hulaŋ hɨmami agaŋ cɨhu hɨhi iahalɨ aba abavɨlalɨ uavɨmi.
